name: mindcandy-events.github.com
tagline: Hacking a jam or jamming a hack? Get your starter resources here!
body:
### Welcome to Mind Candy's Events organisation.

This github organisation is for storing useful starter projects (and completed games) for Game Jams run by [Mind Candy](http://mindcandy.com/) -- but you are free to use them as well! 

(more info will be here soon!)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
